text.tspan: After the golden age: unemployment and inflation in advanced
Unit 17 'The Great Depression, golden age, and global financial crisis’ Section 17.6 'The end of golden age' in The CORE
Team, The Economy. Available at https://tinyco.re/17061687 [Figure 17.16]
Note: The series shown are unweighted averages for 16 OECD countries. CC-BY-ND-NC
